==== Comments ====

The above screen shots illustrate how easy it is to change to the basic appearance of the "Impression" theme. It is important to note this theme depends upon gradients and gradients depend upon two different colors which are capable of producing the desired shadow effect. Choosing base colors which are very dark or light will probably not work well.

JohnBaer
